name: Andrew Smith
description: I am a lot of fun, outgoing and have a great sense of humor. I enjoy going out and meeting new people. Love to laugh and joke around but also knows when to be serious. I look for the positive in all that life has to offer . I believe in being kind and respectful of people and expect the same from others. I enjoy traveling and seeing new places. I love the arts, museum, history and all the beautiful sceneries. The simple things like going to the movies, out to dinner, cooking, decorating, watching plays and concerts make me happy as well. I enjoy watching football, baseball and tennis. I’m loyal, thoughtful, dependable, sweet and good natured.In the romance department, I’m affectionate and demonstrative in my feelings and actions. I love to hold hands, to touch and other gestures to let the person I’m with know that I’m always there for her. I am very romantic and enjoy being made special as I do the same to her.
